title: PixelOffset
description: A pixel offset in viewport coordinates. A pixel offset is the number of pixels up and to the right to place an element relative to an origin.

cartesian2.description: The pixel offset specified as a two-dimensional Cartesian value `[X, Y]`, in viewport coordinates in pixels, where X is pixels to the right and Y is pixels up.

reference.description: The pixel offset specified as a reference to another property.
